page.title: 17Playground Games
page.content: We did a survey about the most popular playground games in our school.They are, football in winter and tennis in summer.The second most popular games are Tiggy and Tig-ball.In Tiggy, one person runs away and another has to chase them. Once caught, the first person has to do the chasing.When you are playing Tig-ball, everyone stands in a circle and whoever catches the bounced ball has to hit someone with it while they run around.The third most popular game is shadow catching - jumping on someone's shadow.Another game is Brussels (started after the Liverpool/Juventus Cup match) where we pile on top of each other.The teachers don't like us playing that, in case we get hurt.
